mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_attachment (blog_post_id, file_url, file_type, file_size, uploaded_at) VALUES (#{blogPostId}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT blog_attachment_id, blog_post_id, file_url, file_type, file_size, uploaded_at FROM blog_attachment WHERE blog_post_id = #{blogPostId} ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC
